context: I like Crazy, Stupid, Love. Have you seen it?
Yes, it was written by Dan Fogelman.
I heard about him. Did he write The Guilt Trip as well?
Thats right, The Guilt Trip is starring Tom Virtue
The Guilt Trip is a Drama genre, right? If i remember it released while back.
Yes, the Guilt Trip was released 2012
That make me think of the movie 2012 that Ryan McDonald and Stephen McHattie was in. What kind of movie was it?
resp: Stephen McHattie starred in Wolves and Watchmen. They're very interesting movies
